main event: A bright red object with a tail or plume was observed in Poteau, Oklahoma, on October 7, 1958.
interesting points: The object hovered for approximately 20 minutes before disappearing to the north,The witness described the object as bright red with a tail and estimated its size to be that of a basketball,The observation was conducted at 2020 hours,The object was seen 10-15 degrees above the horizon to the northeast,Initially considered possibly a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: a bright red object with a tail
witness description: Mr. Chm, a telephone operator who works in aircraft lighting business
